item.title: The Startup Capitals conference will begin on May 20th
item.description:
Source: Startup Capitals’ website. Startup Capitals, a leading-edge conference inspired by the recent book of the same name by Singapore-based author and journalist Zafar Anjum, will be held on May 20th in Singapore at The POD, NLB, 100 Victoria Street. This one-day event, coinciding with the book’s official launch, will highlight the innovation and startup ecosystems of globally impactful cities. It will unite all facets of these ecosystems – entrepreneurs, business leaders, innovators, researchers, educators, government officials, and venture capitalists – under one roof...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-startup-capitals-conference-will-begin-on-may-20th/
